data.message: My name is Nejc. And I wanted to open my new account because in the older one I had too many friends who I do not want to keep in touch anymore. So yesterday I have opened a new one and added some of the friends i wanted to have on my new account. But now you locked that new account and I can not log in. Can you please help me.

replies.message: Hey Nejc. Your second account was disabled because it is against Facebook Terms to maintain more than one personal account. While you can't have two accounts, it is possible to merge them. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2zD21w8. If you'd rather use one account, please delete the account you do not want by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2yBFpIy. We hope this helps. -Elizabeth
I understand. But i want to keep memories at that account. Now i haye tthis account without friends and the new one disabled? Can you make an exception?
that was my point, i dont want to merge them, i what to keep memories at the old one, and from now on use the new one. thanks for answer.
